#USA  #vaccinated.

So, my thread below started out of curiosity as I wanted to see who were the 1st here to receive the new #PfizerBioNTech #Covid19 #vaccination. It all began w/ #SandraLindsay in #NewYork . Next?! 

Awaiting #Tennessee & #Guam…

Mark Lennihan and 9 othersQuote TweetCurtis S. Chin@CurtisSChin · Dec 17, 2020#USA  #PuertoRico 

Yahaira Alicea Nieves, a respiratory therapist who treated the 1st #COVID19 patients at a San Juan Hospital, becomes 1st person on the island to be vaccinated against the novel coronavirus. 

Ht @MiamiHerald @syraob
